AzureBlade saw that Nightlight was battling the program. He was 
anxious about it, but decided to lend a helpful hand.

AzureBlade: Nightlight! I'll give you more energy! Here it comes!

With these words, energon started to flow from his spark to hers. In 
the real world, his body started trembling a little, as if from cold 
(which was unusual for an ice dragon) and to slowly lean forward, as 
if from a great weight on his shoulders.
